Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Inverter output voltage deviation. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 30/01/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
